message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $140. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $130? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
